channel.title: Help with 10x Hit's
channel.description:
[code]you wouldn't really have to add a custom packet to the client, just modify where the client reads the HP -- the reason it caps at 255 is because it's sent as an unsigned byte. An unsigned byte's max value is 255. So, theoretically if you change your server to send it as a short and have the client read it as a short, you should be good to go.[/code]
Anyone know how to do this? I already added the hit multiplier but the skill level says 990 and the HP reading at the top right maxes out at 225.

item.title: Help with 10x Hit's
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“tarheels, post:1, topic:389123”]you wouldn't really have to add a custom packet to the client, just modify where the client reads the HP -- the reason it caps at 255 is because it's sent as an unsigned byte. An unsigned byte's max value is 255. So, theoretically if you change your server to send it as a short and have the client read it as a short, you should be good to go.

Anyone know how to do this? I already added the hit multiplier but the skill level says 990 and the HP reading at the top right maxes out at 225.[/quote]

My server capped out at 1026

Odd…

I would use something like this

Not completely sure where to put it though.

					if (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] > 254) {
						outStream.writeByte(255);
						outStream.writeDWord(playerLevel[playerHitpoints]);

Read full topic
